ingredients: pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, 4 cups peeled and sliced mango,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 2 teaspoons lemon juice, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 tablespoon butter, cut into small chunks
nutrition: Total Fat 17g 21%, Saturated Fat 5g 24%, Cholesterol 4mg 1%, Sodium 246mg 11%, Total Carbohydrate 50g 18%, Dietary Fiber 3g 12%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 24mg 118%, Calcium 16mg 1%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 161mg 3%
